Review.Titre: Horrible Expirience
Review.Contenu: I'm extremely disappointed with the service provided by this company. After waiting for a whole month with no updates on my order, I had no choice but to cancel it. The customer service representative, Jason, couldn't provide a clear timeline for my refund and falsely assured me it would be processed right away. It's been a week since the cancellation, and I still haven't received my money. This has been a truly horrible experience, and I cannot recommend this company to anyone. Avoid at all costs!

Review.Titre: The website said operating temp is…
Review.Contenu: The website said operating temp is 30-90C for LED Sauna light. But the package said up to 60C. I returned the product, however, they don't give me a return shipping fee back. The website said they will cover for the returning fee if it's their fault. they lies. be careful on temp they claims.+ (adding details)here's my order number : 293442 Refund Shipping Fee : 23.56$

Review.Titre: Terrible!!
Review.Contenu: Terrible!!! After I placed the order I discover the transformers were insufficient Had to pay shipping back and still waiting on the credit to repurchase and pay shipping again!!! You see my money once but not twice!!!

Review.Titre: The suggested LED driver and photocell didnt work
Review.Contenu: The suggested LED driver and photocell suggested to repair the ALTAIR AL-2163 did not work whatsoever. Wiring was simple. Initially I thought the photocell was bad since it was not outputting current, so I ordered another one.  However, none of them worked.  I ultimately contacted the light manufacturer, who provided a much more economical and useful solution.  I am returning the driver and photocells.

Review.Titre: I bought 6 dimmers to install in a…
Review.Contenu: I bought 6 dimmers to install in a group of offices, one of the dimmers unfortunately does not work, I called to request a replacement but they told me that I have to send the damaged one but the shipping and return costs are higher than the equipment itself.  My company has been in the electricity market for 35 years and the person who assisted me treated me as if I were an amateur, I already asked for another one but it is the last time I do business with you

Review.Titre: I was sent the wrong part. Tough titty.
Review.Contenu: I was sent the wrong part.I let them know.They asked for a photo. I sent one.I asked them again to refund me. No Response.I give up. So bad review.Thankyou Jason Larocque.

Review.Titre: Wrong item
Review.Contenu: I do wanna clarify service was excellent I was looking to replace the LED light in a Costco Altair garage carriage light. The rap assured me that what he was sending me would match the color of the other one .not even close the one he sent me is yellow the one I still have is the true white light I will be calling back to get it replaced.

Review.Titre: Support is condescending and very…
Review.Contenu: Support is condescending and very unpleasant to deal with.

Review.Titre: The parts they suggested did not work…
Review.Contenu: The parts they suggested did not work as applied. It did not solve the problem that they were intended. As a result the parts went in the trash along with the component they were purchased to repair. It was a waste of time and money.

Review.Titre: SOOOO much for express shipping.
Review.Contenu: I had a full review here but its not worth it. (a) don't bother with express shipping, no such a thing exists here. been waiting a month for the fastest shipping option. (b) don't bother asking questions, you'll get some sarcastic answer practically right away. it would be better if I was simply told to bugger off rather than take passive aggression from a sales dude (c) do yourself a favour and get another vendor.

Review.Titre: I've been ordering LEDs and supplies…
Review.Contenu: I've been ordering LEDs and supplies from ledsupply.com - However, I cannot recommend them. Despite being a repeat customer, when I called to advise that one LED was not included in the latest order: the representative had an attitude, and reluctantly agreed to send a replacement. I won't order from them again.

Review.Titre: If I could give you a zero I would
Review.Contenu: If I could give you a zero I would.  No instructions, not even a word!  The wiring on the LED strip was so loose that unless it was in the exact correct position, it would not work, and the "motion sensor"  was old and didn't work.  Really, a lot of work and the Fedex package did not even contain a return label.  Please return my money.  It's the least you can do.

Review.Titre: BEWARE!!  THE SITE IS RUNNING A PROMO FOR 5% OFF…
Review.Contenu: THE SITE IS RUNNING A PROMO FOR 5% OFF AND FREE SHIPPING (A BANNER AT THE TOP OF THE POP UP BOX).  WHEN I PLACED THE ORDER (WHICH I SUBSEQUENTLY CANCELLED) IT CHARGED ME $7.99 FOR SHIPPING.  WHEN I CALLED CUSTOMER SERVICE, THE AGENT SAID THAT WAS ONLY FOR 13 OZ. OR LESS.  VERY MISLEADING.I DELETED MY ORDER AND WILL BUY ELSEWHERE.  IF A SITE WILL DRAW YOU IN WITH FALSE PROMISES I CAN'T FEEL COMFORTABLE THAT THEIR PRODUCT IS GOING TO BE OF QUALITY.

Review.Titre: Poor inventory and and material management
Review.Contenu: Ordered LED lights that they had plenty of stock of and a couple weeks later ordered some for the test of my house.  After waiting a couple weeks I inquired and was then told they were out of stock and would be in stock in 4-6 weeks.  At the six week mark I was told would not have them for several more months.

Review.Titre: Constant current driver for LED was good quality!
Review.Contenu: Product (a constant current driver for LED) had its specs clearly delineated on the website, so that when it arrived there were no surprises and the item worked well when installed. Online videos and essays about how to select the correct product were well written and instructive. The product arrived in the mail early and in excellent condition. I was extremely satisfied with my experience purchasing from LEDsupply.

Review.Titre: Site advertises free shipping
Review.Contenu: Site advertises free shipping. When you click on product pages it says free shipping, then when you go to check out your tries to charge you $17. That is false advertising if you ask me. I took my business elsewhere and paid for shipping but at least I knew I was supporting a company that was being honest. Also the shipping was half with these guys recharging so don't tell me about not profiting from Shipping.

Review.Titre: Are you kidding I just called to ask a…
Review.Contenu: Are you kidding I just called to ask a couple questions prior to ordering. The guy who answered the phone was rude and made me feel like I was bothering him. This was all before I asked my first question. I apologized for bothering him and he was still short and rude. I am planning on running LEDs throughout my five fitness studios. Looks like I will now be going elsewhere.What happened to customer service. David

Review.Titre: Worse company ever
Review.Contenu: So when I ordered my product I was on the phone with the guy from store and he said everything was in. Once I place my order a few days later I get a email saying that order is delayed because they don’t have something. It took over a month longer to get it and now that I have it I can not get them on the phone. I’ve been leaving voicemails since November and not one return call. This place is horrible and would not recommend them to any of my clients and will do my best to make sure everyone knows they are no good

Review.Titre: Shipped the wrong product
Review.Contenu: Shipped the wrong product. Identification made ordering the correct product confusing. Owner or cust. Service agent accepted zero responsibility, and wanted me to be 100% responsible. So, I ended up with a product I didn't believe I ordered, and didn't get the product I really needed. I guess when you're an old half broke down Vietnam Vet you tend to get taken advantage of.

Review.Titre: The item I received was used.,,
Review.Contenu: The item I received was used. I could tell by one of the screw tabs being broken off and the wires were twisted. The fixture didn’t work after I installed the part, so I don’t know if it was defective or not. It is not worth messing with a return…

Review.Titre: Buyer Beware
Review.Contenu: Be very careful when ordering power supplies from this website. When choosing an Mean Well LPV series, the voltage/wattage selector on the site brings up the wrong result. A call to customer service was a frustrating mess wherein I was told it was my fault that I received the wrong power supply. They finally accepted a return but kept the shipping. You can get better pricing and better service from TRC.

Review.Titre: Returns completely inflexible
Review.Contenu: Consider prior to purchase that customer retention is not of critical importance with LED Supply. If you have a brand new product, never opened in original boxes there is NO flexibility on returns after 30 days. If your project requirements may change, order elsewhere. Even if it happens to be 1 day past and you happen to be a longtime customer they are unwilling to even offer a company credit.

Review.Titre: No wiring diagrams
Review.Contenu: I purchased this product. And the black and white terminals are supposed to be the power. There were no instructions as well with the packaging sent to me. I fried the component out. When I went online it said the colored wires with the power so I basically wasted my money and went out and bought new lights. Disappointing

Review.Titre: Order Processing Issues
Review.Contenu: Submitted order.  Went to a page that said "order #0 received" .  Order #0?  When I went to the link to "print order" I was taken to a link to create an account.  When I went to the "view order" link I was taken to the home page.  Never received an email confirming my order or any email at all.So, there is no way to reply to the reply from LEDSupply other than to edit my original message!My reply.  What do you mean "no order"? You charged MY CREDIT CARD!

Review.Titre: I am weeks in waiting for my refund…
Review.Contenu: I am weeks in waiting for my refund on drivers. I called 3 times with no answer and got a call back after leaving a voicemail. They claimed to have sent me 3 emails after my order about them being out of stock as well as processing one driver being shipped. Now I’m stuck without drivers for my equipment as I wait for a refund to buy drivers from a company that actually display the availablity of their products.

Review.Titre: This order was fine but their customer…
Review.Contenu: This order was fine but their customer service is garbage.I had bad LEDs and could not get in touch with anyone until I left a bad review. They contacted me trying to help and requested me to reply. I had replied various times and was completely ignored. So here I am again with another bad review for their garbage customer service.

Review.Titre: I bought a led driver form you and it
Review.Contenu: I bought a led driver form you and it didn’t work . I called and talked to customer service and told him the model # I was trying to replace and the 2nd one didn’t work either and you’re company wouldn’t replace them or reimburse me for either.

Review.Titre: poor order status feedback and order fulfillment
Review.Contenu: I ordered three led strip kits. after several weeks I called to check on the status of my order. I was told that it was backordered, something I wasn't informed of prior to my call. several weeks later I called again and was told that the items had arrived and they were filling orders and min would be promptly filled. A week later my package arrived. the order was incomplete and missing over half the items. I called again to be told that they didn't know what had gone wrong and they would look into it and take care of it. I have yet to receive the remainder of my order.

Review.Titre: I am disappointed in the product I …
Review.Contenu: I am disappointed in the product I bought.  I got the 30 LED flex strip and it was 12" long, which was not the size I thought it would be.  I decided I'd try it and not only did but burn through batteries in a matter of days, but the battery housing was so heavy that it couldn't be held up by the adhesive on the battery pack .  The adhesive on the back of the flex strip was also terrible - it didn't stick at all.  Super bummed.

Review.Titre: driver was DOA
Review.Contenu: I purchased an exact replacement for an LED driver. I was certain that the driver was the problem. I connected the new driver in the correct way and it did not work. I went online to request a return or replacement and i did not find any way to do it on the web site.

Review.Titre: Given wrong information
Review.Contenu: I was told that I would have a product shipped within 5 days, I emailed and asked for an updated I was told it would be shipped two days after I emailed, come 4 days after that I had to call into customer service to find out it was going to be an additional 3-4 days because a product was out of stock and I was notified. Not planning on buying again. No apology on the phone no offer to make up the lost time on builds.

Review.Titre: Poor quality control
Review.Contenu: Pros: Products arrived promptly, no issues with ordering or shipping. Information on the site seems pretty good.Quality of products is... not great. I bought an RGB LED strip, controller, and power supply. The controller was defective — worked for about a day, then got hot to the touch, started emitting a smell of burned plastic, and stopped responding to the remote. I suspect a short circuit, but either way, it's toast (literally.) As for the LED strip, it outlasted the controller, but one LED is already partially burnt out — only lights up red — so I have my doubts about how long it'll last overall.

Review.Titre: Incorrect Portrayal
Review.Contenu: The LEDs I purchased were advertised incorrectly. The website portrayed them as a specific wavelength, and this was incorrect. After creating my entire project I could not figure out the issue -- and later learned that the wavelength was entirely incorrect for my project and was two different peaks. Very disappointing experience.

Review.Titre: I ordered this item from Amazon and …
Review.Contenu: I ordered this item from Amazon and paid to have 2 day delivery since we were leaving town in three days.  It did not arrive on time and when I check on line with LEDSupply, I could have purchased the same item for $10.00 and gotten 2 day service for free.  I paid $20.00 for two day shipping and did not get it in 2 days.

Review.Titre: Junk light parts with poor customer service
Review.Contenu: The light I ordered came with a large unable to hide ugly box to control it. Complaining about it to customer service got me a snarky reply. They refused to refund my $17. I hope they really needed it. Junk stuff just thrown together from them. Never again will I buy from them.

Review.Titre: I called directly to purchase LED…
Review.Contenu: I called directly to purchase LED lights acceptable for a shower.  We spoke extensively about the use.  When I received the strip there was a large sign on the front of the packaging that stated the product was not appropriate for water usage.  Very disappointed.

Review.Titre: This was nothing like what was shown
Review.Contenu: This was nothing like what was shown, or described, in the picture.  It was supposed to be the slim, 12v flexible light with peel off backing.  I got a 110V corded LED light strip.  Not worth sending back for $20.  Just stuck with this one, and had to order from another vendor.

Review.Titre: LED Supply Failure
Review.Contenu: I have purchased from LED Supply many times however my last purchase was never received because the postman left the package on my doorstep and it was stolen. They told me basically to deal with USPS who said they left the package in my doorstep. A package worth $200.00 that I paid expedited shipping with no signature needed is a big failure  by LED Supply. I will never buy from them again. Lastly this was a replacement for defective LED flex strips and power supplies. There are better companies to buy from.

Review.Titre: Didn't fix things...
Review.Contenu: We received the part and installed it but it didn't fix our problem. This was after watching an extensive video from LEDSupply suggesting it would be very likely to fix the problem.

Review.Titre: I'm still waiting!
Review.Contenu: I was not aware this was backordered. I have been waiting for two weeks. I wrote to the company yesterday and was advised it was back-ordered. All very frustrating. I knew another color was out of stock but when I ordered, mine appeared to be in stock. I had no notice and no nice email. Simply awful.

Review.Titre: Bad customer service.
Review.Contenu: Ordered some led drivers, should have been delivered in 3-5 business days, almost a month later, still haven't received my order.I phoned and spoke to someone who said they would look into it. Took all my information, haven't heard from them in weeks. Very very bad customer service.Reply;Yes, I have contacted both the USPS and Canada post, Canada has not received it yet. I can't do a trace with USPS because I do not have a US address. I am thankful that you have started a trace, but I haven't heard from you in weeks.

Review.Titre: My order was placed in October of 2020…
Review.Contenu: My order was placed in October of 2020 this order still has not been filled I am missing parts of the order I have contacted David the sales manager on multiple occasions and no one has contacted me back to get it corrected and I was told that the manager had my emails the worst experience I have ever had and I will have to find a different solution for my led needs and don't recommend that any one order from this site ever. Edit 5/14/21 yeah these guys never even tried to contact me. again when you get ghosted by a sales manager. leave a bad review get told he will get back with you and still nothing. THIS PLACE SCAMMED ME. they took my money and never filled the order.

Review.Titre: Don't trust LEDSupply
Review.Contenu: It has been over a month since I first placed my order and still have not gotten a shipping notice. After not even receiving a receipt from LEDSupply 2 weeks after I placed my order, I tried contacting them. After an email and multiple phone calls without response, I was finally able to reach them to which they said my LED would ship in 2 days and arrive a few days later. 2 more weeks have passed and I still have not received a shipping notice or tracking number from them. Placing an order with LEDSupply is by far the worst experience I have ever had with an online retailer and most definitely will never be doing business with them again.

Review.Titre: Placed order months ago
Review.Contenu: Placed order months ago, still have not received any product.  Payed in full by Credit card.  Now sales team will not respond to my emails.  Have had no reply for over a month to multiple emails.  This is a bogus company and I will be reporting this to Visa.

Review.Titre: My package was returned to sender
Review.Contenu: My package was returned to sender, and after reviewing the address I meant to send it to, nothing was wrong with it. Now I don’t have a refund on my checking account or anything, and I’d really like to get my original package.

Review.Titre: The incorrect item was shipped to me…
Review.Contenu: The incorrect item was shipped to me and the error I believe was solely on your end.  I have since found another vendor and have successfully received the correct item. Not  only was this a waste of money but time as well.

Review.Titre: Bad customer service.
Review.Contenu: I purchased these items on the company's recommendation. I installed them and one blew up and the other one did not work. I emailed about the situation and did not receive a response. Not happy. Bad customer service.

Review.Titre: I paid for shipping to be delivered…
Review.Contenu: I paid for shipping to be delivered within 10 days, 20 days later the package is still not even in my country.  I needed these lights for a show but now it's too late to do anything, terrible service, lies on how fast the shipping is

Review.Titre: Wrong part
Review.Contenu: I emailed to make sure I ordered the correct replacement part and was given the part number to place order.  It doesnt fit or even look similar to the part I needed.

Review.Titre: How does the dimmer remote work?
Review.Contenu: Hi - I sent an email to LED supply through their info on their website about a product that doesn't work.  And I haven't heard back 3 days later.  Giving the low review in the hopes of hearing back about my questions.Thanks

Review.Titre: Ridiculous Return Policy and Zero Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Had to return an item that wouldn't work for us and since the box was delivered 2 days passed the 30 day deadline, they won't take it back. Owner didn't care about the holidays delaying anything. Just said he couldn't make any exceptions. Will never do business with them again. I would like to add that my husband didn't reveal his current cancer battle and that he had to have 4 tests done and a biopsy scheduled for tomorrow which also hampered our ability to return the item, but given their strict policy that doesn't allow any exceptions, I doubt the owner even cares. Will be filing a complaint with the BBB this week.

Review.Titre: What I received was a lot different…
Review.Contenu: What I received was a lot different than what I thought I was getting based on the online shopping experience. The strip is only about a foot and takes a huge battery pack to run it?! I was expecting a lot longer strip.

Review.Titre: I didn't know a lot about led lighting…
Review.Contenu: I didn't know a lot about led lighting so I called LED Supply and ask for there help . Mistake, turns out they know about as much as I do.Needed to dim strip lighting in three places separately , also had 116 watts on one dimmer let them know this,they said no problem.What I received would not dim lights separately two dimmers were on the same frequency , and the remote for the 116 watt lighting was only rated to handle 72 watts MAX. Good thing I checked it after hooking it up , got hot as a fire cracker in about three minutes,and would have caught the house on fire. after making them aware of this they had no fix ,so I need to get the dimmers that will do the job somewhere else.

Review.Titre: Order Processing Issues
Review.Contenu: Order did not complete processing and I received no confirmation order was placed.  Not certain why I'm receiving this survey and hoping I don't receive the product since I ordered it elsewhere.

Review.Titre: When I ordered this string of LED's it was a complete failure
Review.Contenu: When I ordered this string of LED's I was pleased with the solution it offered: a string of LED's, a the correct temperature, connectors to choose from, could be stuck to a flat surface and economical costs.I was sent a connector that was for right angle connecting. This is not what I wanted or asked for; The clamps on the connectors could not securely or electrically connect the strips (the plastic is too thick); the adhesive on the string of LED's, while attached to a wooden shelf, failed immediately.I carefully cleaned the wood surface with alcohol to remove wax or dirt,I will return the whole mess to you with this suggestion:  Please test your products before you sell them.

Review.Titre: We ordered this bulb on Feb 20th and…
Review.Contenu: We ordered this bulb on Feb 20th and have yet to receive it. I do not have a phone number so unable to complain directly. Maybe filling out this form will facilitate some kind of action.  Thanks.Today is March 15

Review.Contenu: Kinda pricey, but I'm basically getting custom LEDs most of the time! My entire theater work light system uses the 3-Up Cree LED boards. Ultra efficient, great control, great light.

Review.Titre: cree xpg2 3-up fiasco
Review.Contenu: First i must admit that ledsupply.com personel are very concerned about clients technical questions but it is not enough. I bought two sets with 1500mah drivers 11 months ago. I installed leds to either side of my motorcycle. Then 5 months later right side led malfunctioned. 2 months ago i contacted with led supply about my complainment. They said it could be due to overheating of pcb plate during soldering . So i purchased an other led module. It was shipped quickly and installed it to the existing heat sink. And guess what (!!!). The led do not function at the beginning.  I live 5000 miles away from US. How am i supposed to send it back???. my loses have already reached USD 50+. I do not recommend purchasing from that site if you aren't living next door to them.

Review.Titre: Honest review of a very unsatisfied customer
Review.Contenu: When I recieved the package it came with the wrong ac power adapter so I had to wait and extra 4 days to receive the correct materials to even use my new lights. After having the right means to put up the lights the sticky side of the lights is absolutely terrible it fell down 6 times before I had to go out and buy command strips to keep it from falling down. I really wish that was all the bad things but then the reciever that you point the remote at to change the colors almost never works it takes me to press the button 8 maybe 9 times before the lights even react and change to the correct color. I thought I was buying a top tier product for LED lights but in the end I was given a terrible, over priced led light that I could have gotten from amazon for a 1/3 of the price. I thought going with and LED specific company would pay off but I would not recommend this product to anyone and just refer you away from this website to either amazon or another led light strip company.

Review.Contenu: Over priced. I found those for $ 1.98 in digikey. Exactly the same item. Never buy from your company.  Made a big mistake

Review.Titre: 4"led
Review.Contenu: My order was shipped on time arrived in good condition and work's like it should.

Review.Titre: I paid for 2 day shipping ..
Review.Contenu: I paid for 2 day shipping ... order was delayed for weeks and you still charge me for the 2 day shipping charge

Review.Titre: Defective
Review.Contenu: The lights are beautiful, but they are supposed to be motion activated. There is no sensor, just an on-off switch

Review.Titre: Purchased a LED Driver
Review.Contenu: I purchased a replacement LED driver for an outdoor light and it lasted less than a week.  Back to square one!!

Review.Titre: Replacement of Transformer suggested by…Lamps Plus Vendor in West Los Angeles
Review.Contenu: Replacement of Transformer suggested by vendor did not work. When using dimmer to the lowest, light blinks.

Review.Titre: really bad
Review.Contenu: My pack ended nowhere. USPS blocked the parcel in customs. I will try to avoid being charged. Total scam.

Review.Titre: Its so dim it’s worthless
Review.Contenu: Its so dim it’s worthless. Obviously the supply is not compatible. Don’t waste your time or money

Review.Titre: Very satisfied with the What you…
Review.Contenu: Very satisfied with the What you recommended I get to replace my existing light fixtures. Thanks

Review.Titre: The drivers did not work for my lights…
Review.Contenu: The drivers did not work for my lights even though they were the ones identified as replacements.

Review.Titre: They provided me with two different lights
Review.Contenu: They provided me with two different light strips in my order. This caused problems for my installation. Upon calling them they were very helpful in diagnosing the problem and correcting the issue.

Review.Titre: I was sent three lights,and only ordered two
Review.Contenu: I was sent three lights,and only ordered two. I was assured by your rep tge 3rd wouldn't br sent, but it still was. I was sent a return label by your company and sent it FED EX. I'm not showing that my refund has been made to my account. The experience has not been good & I'm not happy. Someone should call me and fix this.

Review.Titre: My order was confused with another…
Review.Contenu: My order was confused with another customer's.I received his order, and he received mine.Rather than take the chance of another mishap, we, at our own expense, contacted each other and mailed the ordered merchandise ourselves.

Review.Titre: My LED sauna lights will not stick to…
Review.Contenu: My LED sauna lights will not stick to anything.  If you are selling LED Sauna lights with adhesive... you'd think the adhesive would work in a sauna... otherwise it is just decorative.  I asked for other solutions and was not offered any.  Turns out LED supply sells something called LED brackets (and in fact the description for this product says that 5 clips come with these lights- but none were enclosed with the lights).  That will likely be the only solution... and would have been a great thing to offer.  Secondly the rep offered replacement lights... I replied OK, and then he sent them saying that I need to return the first ones.  Bad communication.  Conditions should have been clear prior to sending the replacement lights

Review.Titre: Item was damaged in shipping
Review.Contenu: Item was damaged in shipping.  Looks like it was dropped or thrown and dented the enclosure (through the padded envelope and cardboard box.  It is functional so I'm not going to return it.

Review.Titre: Placed my order on a Thursday evening
Review.Contenu: Placed my order on a Thursday evening.  Chose 2day Fed Ex shipping.  Order wasn't delivered until the following Thursday.  Order should have arrived no later than the following Tuesday since that Monday was a Holiday.

Review.Titre: 22 gauge wire is bad
Review.Contenu: Items shipped quickly. IP20 strip light a good product with one exception. I've sent an email outlining the problem. Your 22 gauge wire was the problem. The wire was incompatible with the low profile beetle clips. The clip would not cut through the insulation well enough to establish an electricl connection. I eventually went through 10 clips before giving up on your wire. I used some other 22 gauge wire that I had onhand, and the clips worked fine. I managed to pry open the used clips and was able to reuse them. But before i finally decided what the problem was, It was one of the most frustrating projects that I've undertaken in a long time.

Review.Titre: No customer service support!
Review.Contenu: I used the web site trouble isolation to determine which LED i needed for my outdoor light. It led me to order and LED board that was not compatible with my lights. my light is 30VDC and the (2) boards I ordered are 12VDC. Didn't realize this until installing it. Burned out one of the two. Sent a email to customer support and got no response - Want to return the unused, unburnt out board. How do I do it?

Review.Titre: I read that shipping was free
Review.Contenu: I read that shipping was free, and then I was charged because I bought 8 lights.  apparently if I bought 1 light the shipping would be free or if I made 8 individual orders.  A great way to reward a customer for a larger purchase!

Review.Titre: No Strain relief for power connections
Review.Contenu: The LED light strip kit does not have strain relief for the power connections. The connections broke off at the solder joints on the LED light strip as soon as I took the part out of the box.  I was able to resolder.

Review.Titre: The LED solder to the board separated…
Review.Contenu: The LED solder to the board separated from one of the cables after about 10 minute of operation. I happened to have a solder iron and was able to reattach it.

Review.Titre: The part I ordered did not fit or work…
Review.Contenu: The part I ordered did not fit or work in the fixture I was trying to repair.

Review.Titre: I have bought from you guys several…
Review.Contenu: I have bought from you guys several times before and had great success with your products and customer service. This last time my experience was horrible with your sales rep who blatantly didn't want to help me. I told him my ideas and what I wanted, he said he wasn't going to deal with me just saying numbers. That I needed to email it with what I wanted. Horrible experience with him which led me to look for a product elsewhere.

Review.Titre: I think the products are great but I…
Review.Contenu: I think the products are great but I was subject to duty and taxes that I don't have to worry about from other suppliers. I live in Canada was charged $20 for shipping (via Fedex) from LEDSupply and then was hit with another duty/taxes bill for $47, over half my initial order of $73. I have no clue how other vendors pay for the duty, but this is unacceptable.

Review.Titre: Need better communication of parts availability
Review.Contenu: Was promised by email the items I was looking for would be able to be delivered in 16 business days, presented my quote to the customer and won it at this quoted price. After winning the quote and ordering I was then told the item would not be available until 2 months later, and had to buy an upgraded model at nearly double the cost to meet my customer’s deadline without receiving liquidated damages. The items I received worked fine, but their poor communication killed all the profit on my job.

Review.Titre: I received some LED warm white 9ft…
Review.Contenu: I received some LED warm white 9ft strips and 2 plug in transformers for them.After about 30min one plug in transformer failed.I went to a different vendor and found the replacement for both of them.Now it works without any problems.I gave 2 stars because, although I am pleased with the LEDS, I am displeased with the cheap transformers that was suggested for the application from the sales matrix. They got hot and failed.

Review.Titre: LED Strip Lighting Tracks
Review.Contenu: The issues that i had with the LED strip lighting tracks were two fold.  One was that i had to pay almost 25% for shipping “2-3 day shipping” that didnt arrive until 5 days later.  Also the clips to hold the track in place ate not only difficult to lock in but they do t hold and the tracks come down.  Thats an issue when you have to solder pieces that break free when the clips pop.  Especially when they are under counter lighting.

Review.Titre: Your online order system needs work
Review.Contenu: Your online order system needs work. I ordered a small led strip light and your system forced me to pick a power supply. Five bucks, no big deal so I picked the one recommended. When your package was delivered I found a power supply already integrated in the strip light and the extra supply I was forced to order was not even needed (plus it doesn’t even fit with the strip I bought).

Review.Titre: I’ve had great luck with these guys…
Review.Contenu: I’ve had great luck with these guys before and like them, but this order wasn’t so good. The light was fine but I ordered a 3 foot track too. The box had been bent and the track was broken in the middle. There was also no screws included. I’ve bought them before and they always sent screws. I’m sure I could have returned it but Not that big a deal, I pieced it together and made it work, but I thought it worth mentioning since you asked.

Review.Titre: Woeful Experience
Review.Contenu: I paid for overnight shipping and was promised next day delivery.  Three days later, the order had not arrived.  I complained, and I was told that the order was not picked up when scheduled, and my expedited freight would be refunded.  Three more days went by, my order arrived and I was still charged for overnight shipping for an order that took a week.  Best of all, the part that I ordered did not work at all.  Other than all that, everything was wonderful.

Review.Titre: Poor customer service
Review.Contenu: I paid for 2-day Fed Ex shipping and it took over a week.  I realize weather impacted the timing but I should not be charged.My bigger issues is that I tried calling customer service on two separate occasions and was directed to leave a message.  Never received a call back prior to the order.  I called again after receiving my order and was sent to voicemail. This was over a week ago and I still have not received a call back.  Very poor customer service both before and after the sale.

Review.Titre: stock issues
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately my order has still not arrived after namore than one and a half months and was only shipped till a month after placement. Products listed as in stock were not in stock. Good selection of items and info on the site however unable to give a positive review in this instance.

Review.Titre: I had ordered 3 LED bulbs for my older…
Review.Contenu: I had ordered 3 LED bulbs for my older maglite.  There were advertised having no center black spots in the light output.  Ordered 3 units and when they arrived, black center spot.  I emailed LED Suooly about this issue and they informed me that it was maglite's reflector not their bulbs.  Didn't offer me a chance for returns or anything.  I'm dunn ordering anything from this company again

Review.Titre: I watched the repair video for my Alere…
Review.Contenu: I watched the repair video for my Alere outdoor LED lantern, purchased the LED driver recommended for repair, wired it as directed, and it doesn't work.  It does "click" which means the LED is working and the driver needs replacement.  Seemingly helpful recommendations and instructions would have been great if they only worked!  My rocket engineer neighbor did the work and we checked it again against the instructions so I know we did the repair correctly.  Bummer!

Review.Titre: incorrect materials shipped.
Review.Contenu: The package came promptly but was incorrect.There were no clips for the plastic installer strip, no electric connection wiring and double wiring for the led supply. I tried calling , was told a callback would be done soon but 24hrs later I got a callback.By that time my husband had rigged it up with his supplies. I was disappointed that the packing was not accurate.

Review.Titre: Everytime I solder wire to a switch…
Review.Contenu: Everytime I solder wire to a switch then after 30 minutes of moving wire around it ends up breaking off at solder point.i mean when I move switch and wire to the side to solder other components the red wire breaks no problem with the black wire breaking, I've soldered slot of wire and used only best solder in my lifetime, so I don't know what it is doing it wire clips are out of the question red wire is dissapointing black wire works great that's my review money down the drain on red wire.

Review.Titre: Poor customer service and shipping
Review.Contenu: Product appears to be ok. Bought 3000k led strand of lights, once installed, significantly warmer in color than standard 3000k. I wanted to exchange it. Had to pay shipping, return shipping, another shipping fee to get replacement. I paid extra for 2 day shipping for replacement, still haven’t received new light strand, it’s been over a week.  Customer service not helpful in any way.  Rarely able to get a person on the phone. Had to call multiple times, and not helpful with situation once I finally got a rep on the line.

Review.Titre: Well I Rec tum... Daing near Kilt'm.
Review.Contenu: Maybe it's because of the Coronacrap... You took my money so fast that it blew my mind... You didn't send me any kind of notice of any thing concerning my ORDER... As of now I don't have any kind of receipt... As far as the product... I ordered to have as spares... and looking for something else I found some on the net that was similar to yours... It's an adapter to use a 9 Volt battery  for effects pedals that has the little plug on it to plug to the pedal...

Review.Titre: LEDSupply falsely sells LED strip lengths
Review.Contenu: LEDSupply falsely sells LED strips by the foot, like 12 feet, but since these LED strips are VERY likely made in China, they are manufactured in metric units (meter). So the 12 foot strips they sold me are actually 3.5 meters, which is 11.5 feet, meaning 6 inches short.

Review.Titre: LED clips now have too short of screws compared to old product sold a couple years ago.
Review.Contenu: A few years ago I bought the plastic clamps with a screw that you use to retain LED strip lights in place, and they worked excellent. A couple weeks ago, I bought some more for some new projects, and the screw lengths were shortened up.  The screw length is now so short that an adult can no longer grasp them with your fingers and insert them into a wood pilot hole !!  The part number is LO-10MB-IPx / LO-10MB-IP67, Mounting Brackets for 12V LED Strips, Strip Type : Waterproof.I wish they would return to the longer screws, which are easy to handle with your fingers and install.  The short screws are a pain in the you know what !!

Review.Titre: Causes EMI electrical interference
Review.Contenu: Timely shipment but the product is the issue. The power adapter was ordered to power a piece of ham radio equipment, which it does. However, the power adapter generates EMI electrical interference. Since the photo of the product shows ferrite filers on each end of the 12v cord, I expected this would not have an EMI issue. I added three additional clamp-on ferrites with no improvement. When operating the radio equipment from a 12v battery there’s no electrical interference. Buyers should be warned of this possibility.

Review.Titre: Customer service and delivery was…
Review.Contenu: Customer service and delivery was terrific. The problem is we are installing outdoor LED strips on my stairs. The clips that join the strips to the wiring are not working and is putting the whole project at risk. After reading other reviews of these clips I would wonder why they would even be an option?

Review.Titre: Not as described or pictured
Review.Contenu: Not as described or pictured. The photo of an adapter connected to a reflector is NOT the adapter that I received. Other photos of adapter are closer to what the adapter actually looks like, but still not quite right. Also the adapter has a diameter of ~51mm, not 54mm, as stated in the description. Not sure how the adapter is supposed to couple to the COB LEDs either. There is nothing on the adaptor to attach it to either COB LED or any of the aluminum housing units sold by LED supply. Adapter does connect to the 54mm reflector. Full documentation appears to be correct, but product description and photos are largely inaccurate and misleading.

Review.Titre: 1” LED Strip Channel
Review.Contenu: While the support at LED Supply is outstanding, this particular product is flawed.  It is very difficult to insert the diffuser in general, and after you mount the strip and then attempt to insert the diffuser, it is nearly impossible.  This is a poor design and an exercise in frustration.

Review.Titre: The mounting clips were missing from…
Review.Contenu: The mounting clips were missing from the order. I emailed the company and they replied saying that they do not send the mounting clips when you order the optional mounting track that I had ordered.  No where does it say anything about this on the website.  I pointed this out and asked them to send me the clips.  They then ceased to reply to emails.  All over them not sending me 50 cents worth of plastic.  To top it off, the lights strobe!  Sad to be treated so poorly by a local company.

Review.Titre: You are not honest to your costumer …
Review.Contenu: You are not honest to your costumer regarding shipping fee...I tried to look how much I will pay for the shipping cost and I see price list that are very much lower than the cost when I "commit" the purchase...So, I end up to pay 13US$ for the 5us$ item....and you know what? the item is still nowwhere to be found on the tracking number you gave to me....You are "no match" compared to ebay, gearbest, and dx dealextreme.

Review.Titre: Double side tape inadequate!
Review.Contenu: Love the LED strip lights but the solderless gapless connections are very temperamental. If you are connecting ends of strip lights together they are ok but for anything else use the use the gapless connection with leads, less of a headache. The double sided tape isn't even strong enough to hold the the led strips and they keep falling down, frustrating! I'll have to find another way to secure them to my cabinets

Review.Titre: I didn’t get my package
Review.Contenu: I didn’t get my package. I reached out to customer service, and they told me that the tracking from USPS said delivered, which I already knew. I have video footage that shows it was not delivered. It may or may not be the responsibility of LED supply to help me out here, but there were no suggestions or offers.

Review.Titre: LEDSupply is a 5 star company
Review.Contenu: LEDSupply is a 5 star company; however the Cree XP-L has a failure problem.  I used 112 of the XP-L's, 3-up, 3000 deg leds and after a few months 6 have failed.  They are rated at 3 Amps, I used them at 1 Amp.  The temperature rating is 160 deg C, the heat sink temperature in back of the led is 72 deg C.  They should not have burned out.  I have also used dozens of Cree XP-G's and none have failed after several years.LEDSupply needs to look into the problem.

Review.Titre: Your website made it sound so easy for…
Review.Contenu: Your website made it sound so easy for the layman to use your Buckbullet to convert 12 volt AC to 12 volt DC for LED lights.  Turns out there are some technical issues involved as well. Should make your site and products easier to use for do it you selfers. You would sell more.

Review.Titre: Can not recommend based on my experience
Review.Contenu: I followed their recommendation for replacing surface mounted LEDs.  Well, they didn't work.  They claimed it "must be wired wrong" - it wasn't.  Then it "must be the driver, here's the one you need" - the new assembly didn't work in the multiple fixtures.  Finally, no returns on "used" products.  In short, they don't stand behind their recommendation or their product.  Fortunately, my credit card immediately and permanently removed the charges.  After that they suddenly offered a refund if I would send the LEDs back...I wonder why.

Review.Titre: I use led supply for most of my…
Review.Contenu: I use led supply for most of my projects. I ordered a part for a customer ordered commission in January and didn't receive it until the middle of February. Communication was almost non existent and there was no apology or fix for the late wait.

Review.Titre: My order is on hold
Review.Contenu: My order is on hold, something to do with an error on one of the products. It was apparently out of stock or discontinued or something. I am going to need to cancel the order completely as an indefinite hold will cause issues with my bank account.Sincerely,Catherine R. Allison

Review.Titre: Cutting and splicing
Review.Contenu: Helpful service, fast delivery, poor design.  If cutting and splicing waterproof light strip connectors don't work. Removed and tried to reposition wire clips about 20 times second string will not light up.

Review.Titre: I have made a few purchases that have …
Review.Contenu: I have made a few purchases that have been great but the last few times i have gotten some faulty products and they keep telling me it's my fualt there faulty and that I'm running things to high when i follow their suggestion on what to run things at I'll  be it. i do the max allowed but if it doesn't work right that high they shouldnt say that it does and it would be fine. and i would give them 5 if instead of arguing that it's the costomers they just make it right and refund or send new product in closing they went from a 5 to a 2 in my eyes and i may take my business else where ....respectfully

Review.Titre: It didn’t work
Review.Contenu: It didn’t work. After connecting the strips it made short circuit and the remote control became useless and only one color remained in use. To turn it off I need to unplug whole thing. Shame.

Review.Titre: The dimmers work like they should but …
Review.Contenu: The dimmers work like they should but they had a broken tab on each one when I got them so I removed them then later realized they were needed to hold the face plate on. If the dimmers didn’t have a broken tab I would leave a 5 star review

Review.Titre: Poor communication
Review.Contenu: Poor communication. Sent parts that do not match. Phone messages returned via email only, never answering questions directly to the issue or related to the questions at all.Had to return complete order.

Review.Titre: I still can't review the actual…
Review.Contenu: I still can't review the actual products as I have still not received them. I ordered 2 items on March 5th, both were listed as in stock. I received an email on March 6th notifying me that one of the items I ordered was on backorder and would ship on March 22nd along with my other item.Well, it is now March 22nd, NO products received yet, NO emails from LED supply updating my order status just this "Please review your experience email" which I have done.oh, btw....the rest of this order which I was able to fulfill from Amazon, was received complete in  3 days.That's what I get for trying to give other, smaller online businesses a try.Disappointed,Robert

Review.Titre: The led driver shown applicable to…
Review.Contenu: The led driver shown applicable to Altair led coach lights will not work on later models which look the same in the pictures, however the later models have a different led driver and photo cell.

Review.Titre: Bad return policy
Review.Contenu: The LED driver that I bought from them died. It was covered under warranty, but they wanted me to send the bad one in first. It would have cost more for shipping than it was worth. Otherwise, they have good prices.

Review.Titre: LED connectors are useless
Review.Contenu: Bought a roll of the water proff LED lights. The connectors that I bought that were suppose to connect to lights and powere supply were useless. Not a little useless totally useless. Ended up not using them. Looked at a itunes viedo that show how to Pull back silicon water proff material and solder wire directly to the copper strips of the LED light string. Worked great, made a good solid connection.In response to your reply. The wires (Pig tails) you sent with connectors do not fit into the metal V slot. So when you clamp the lid down on connector the wire is not secure. On the other side of the connector the pin does not penetrate thru the paper on the LED role to connect to the copper strip.

Review.Titre: Not the best of quality
Review.Contenu: My battery pack almost immediately broke the first time i tried to use it. I put batteries in it and then as soon as i flipped the switch, the switch caved into the battery pack and became almost unusable...

Review.Titre: Bad Adhesive Backing
Review.Contenu: The adhesive backing on the light strip has failed after only a couple weeks on the inside of the truck bed.  The surface was prepped and cleaned and already the light strip fell off the inside of the bed.

Review.Titre: misleading on “free shipping”
Review.Contenu: The website is misleading with the “free shipping” bullet point. When actually there is a 13oz limit, 13oz. Also, I had to pay almost 30.00 to to return the lights I purchased.phil burnette

Review.Titre: I ordered the LED strip connectors and…
Review.Contenu: I ordered the LED strip connectors and they did not work.  I ordered four of them and all four did not work.  I tried to reach out to customer service, and they did not seem to care.

Review.Titre: Shipping on Returns not so great ...
Review.Contenu: Products seem fine but they don't have 3000k in their 5050s. The biggest complaint is returns - you pay your own return shipping and their outbound shipping. Buyer beware.

Review.Titre: product arrived defective
Review.Contenu: product arrived defective. Payed over $50 for 16 feet of led strip lights and a portion of them light up the wrong color. Project is now at a stand still while i return the defective reel.

Review.Titre: product was extremely late and not…
Review.Contenu: product was extremely late and not communicated that it would be late.  the product did not do what I needed it to do even though the sales person said it would,

Review.Titre: Although the ac to dc converter was…
Review.Contenu: Although the ac to dc converter was rated at 8 amps 100 watts, it wouldn't run a cooling fan that was 6.5 amps and 80 watts so it turned out to be a waste of money.

Review.Titre: At the time of this review I have had…
Review.Contenu: At the time of this review I have had two sales experiences with this company. The first was for a single LED and lens. The purchase was easy and the order shipped immediately. The second order was for a few LED’s and lenses, all listed as being well stocked. A number of days later I had not received any information about the order, neither any information about the payment received or any information about the order being shipped.I finally got a reply to my email queries only to be told that they were out of stock and it would be a number of days before they could ship them out,I have found alternatives for supply, but the lack of timely communication has cost me time and money. The LEAST the company could have done was to ship the rest of the order to me, and sent the back order to me later when it arrived.As the owner of a company, I consider communication to be the most important of ALL customer services!

Review.Titre: Had a couple good orders, ended up dropping the ball
Review.Contenu: I had made a few orders in the past with no problems.  In the past I did not need anything shipped urgently, so I would use 2-3 day shipping.   This last order that I made was a rush order so I paid the overnight delivery fee to get my products on time.  However,  It took them an extra day to ship the items.   They said that it was because I entered a PO Box on accident instead of my home and that it was an issue with Paypal.   Its not my fault that there is a paypal issue.  I relied on LED supply to be efficient and get the products out on time.  Overnight shipping almost doubled my order cost.  I was late on getting my product done and had a very disapointed client.   LED supply says it still not their fault and offered no compromise and stopped replying to me.   I will find another LED supplier to order from next time

Review.Titre: LED Supply not bad, certain items terrible
Review.Contenu: Ok so I ordered a driver, LED strips, connectors, and wire. Everything is great, except for the connectors. I wish I could leave a review for the specific items, as I would give LEDSupply 4-5 stars.Low Profile Beetle Clip Connectors for IP20 LED Strips - this item however is terrible. I ordered about 50-60 of them to connect several small strips in cabinets in a built-in entertainment center. I thought they would save time and make the project easier. I was wrong. It would have been much better to just solder all the connections on the bench. I'll say it again, these connectors are terrible. I had to redo the connections several times, the connection points were very weak. Sometimes the connection wouldn't be made, sometimes it would come loose despite being fully depressed. Just plain junk. Save yourself the frustration and don't buy these connectors, measure your lengths, and solder.

Review.Titre: My order took nearly two months to…
Review.Contenu: My order took nearly two months to ship. Communication was very poor from LED Supply. Apparently, part of my order was tied up somewhere with some supplier. I contacted LED Supply after 4 weeks of no delivery. They said, there was a problem with part of the order, and would send it out as soon as it came in, most likely before the end of the month. The end of the month came and went, no delivery. Contacted them again, same story... "most likely ship by the end of THIS month"... Got a notice that my credit card had been charged, which I assumed meant that my order had shipped. Ten days later, I contacted them again. They said, no, my order had not shipped yet... they had to go ahead and charge my card or the order would have been deleted! I would have been much more understanding had I been contacted by LED Supply regarding the status of my order. I was left in the dark. Bad form, LED Supply!

Review.Titre: Received wrong lights
Review.Contenu: Received wrong lights, it appeared I was ordering ostwin light and received some other brand. Was trying to match existing lights that I have.

Review.Titre: BEWARE - wrong units shipped
Review.Contenu: ordered 2 transformers for LEDs that I want to convert to hard-wired.  received them in record time -2-3 days.  Scheduled the electrician to install, and it turned out that the wrong units were delivered.  At first I thought it was my mistake, but then I compared the numbers on the units to my order and they were off by 2 digits, meaning they were not right for the fixtures, and could not be installed. I ordered the right ones, and it took over a week to get them, and I now have to pay the electrician for the 2nd visit to install the right ones.  The units are less then 5 bucks each, so it's not even worth my time to hassle the company for a refund and return the wrong units - they're going in the trash. I'm already out the cost of my electrician's time to come out the first time...  My advice, if you must order from this place, be sure to thoroughly check that what you received is actually what you ordered.

Review.Titre: The product worked and the company is…
Review.Contenu: The product worked and the company is very nice to deal with however the wiring is cheap and thin and easily broken. In the PIR set ups.

Review.Titre: Bad batch
Review.Contenu: Strip did not work with DC. Touched on a car battery at 12v and didnt work. Worked once on AC for a test after DC after, nothing happened.

Review.Titre: No costumer service
Review.Contenu: Called about a question...spoke to answering machine which promised a callback by representative  within a day... never called back

Review.Titre: Customer Service.
Review.Contenu: I have purchased many LED light strips over the last three and a half years from LED Supply. Overall my experience was very good until recently. During the past 3 1/2 years I purchased six different systems to install  install in friends and families houses and given those as gifts. I have bought many LED remote control cables to be able to turn the light strips on/off and dim them. The reason,  I have purchased many remotes is they seem like To fail frequently. They will work for several months and then don’t work at all and  must be removed and replaced with another cable and remote. This is not the case on all installations I have done but is the case on several  of them. LED has replaced them on one or two orders at no charge and has sent me at no charge a replacement remote cable when a remote came in a package with no remote cable. For the most part I have paid to replace at least a dozen remote cables and not asked for any concession. Review.Titre: Micro puck came melted looking.
The part did not fit or work
Salesman seemed not to understand my complaint was lousy eng'g
Review.Contenu: So I ordered and received some Seoul Z Power white triple-ups. When I got them (and after I called the vendor) was when I learned that by default the LEDs were wired in series, neither the description nor the order code mentioned this. But even worse the jumpers were located WAY inboard on the metal star! You need to appreciate that EVERY OTHER vendor locates all user-accessed pads WAY out toward the edge. If you locate the user pads way inboard then you need to locate "thermal relief" cutouts in the aluminum layer underneath the pads. Otherwise when you apply solder-melting heat you'll just have ALL the components slide off the PCB at the same time! Worse when you try and reheat the pads to put the parts back on the pads will only tolerate a few "solder cycles" then they'll delaminate right off the PCB and your entire assembly will become useless. I'm not even going to try and return these parts because I doubt they'll agree they are "defective" but in truth they are - defective by design! They're the most end-user-hostile MCPCB stars I've seen so far in this entire industry and the salesman didn't seem at all willing to acknowledge what a pile of caca he was selling (I guess because his commission checks continue to cash OK) but everyone else ought to stay well away from such a poorly thought-out design. In regard to the reply: Exactly how does "reprimanding me for not reading some obscure note" or taking back merchandise result in me getting in my hands properly designed products that I can actually USE the way I want and need? This is all just attitude and posturing and BS and "the customer doesn't know or understand what he wants like we do therefore the customer is wrong". The technical points I brought up are all completely valid and as long as that's true you are attempting to sell a horribly designed product that I can't use and hardly anyone else can either but the vendor figures so long as he mounts an intensive campaign that anyone who has trouble using his product as a doofus who can barely solder in the first place they're going to continue to get a certain amount of sales. I don't want to make this into a competitive issue but as soon as I realized what a thermal disaster this product was I immediately went to a local store and bought some units made by brand "V" and you just look at where they put the user pads on THEIR MCPCBs (absolute outer radius, which as I said makes it usable) so I was able to put them into service immediately instead of getting into interminable arguments about why I don't understand what a wonderfully designed product I just received. Good luck with THAT strategy!

And finally the LED bulb screw holes don’t align with the factory screw holes and the included tape doesn’t stick to the heat sink panel too well.  For the price, better adaptation parts should be included in this kit.  LED Retrofit Kit for Outdoor Light FixturesAL-LED6W-xx-KIT / AL-LED6W-30-KIT
