The corner connector is too long that if you use it, you have a big dead spot on all 90 degree corners you make. Maybe not a lot of people make 90 degree corners because its just bad. Shipping is fast though if you are avoiding amazon nowadays due to COvid.

Review.Titre: self stick led lights
Review.Contenu: i used these self stick LED lights under my new kitchen cabinets. i cleaned the area real good before installing them, everything was going well until i got half way done the lights started falling down no matter what i did they wouldnt stay. went to home depot and got a roll of double face tape this solved the problem. glue has a shelf life,maybe this roll of lights were expired. i love the lights.they give off great light,most of all my wife likes them. thank you for your help on the phone.

Review.Titre: Alright, but some room to improve
Review.Contenu: I found that after I placed my order, I got a confirmation, but no shipping information.  That is odd in this age -- why not add a "your order has shipped!" email with tracking information?  Also, I felt the cost to be somewhat higher than expected, but I was limited by the parameters of the project.

Review.Titre: The quality of the products they ship…
Review.Contenu: The quality of the products they ship is excellent.  They will ship small orders for the cost of a first-class stamp -- also excellent.  But, they struggle to calculate the proper resistor to use with their LED's.  Buy their products but do your own math.

Review.Titre: Just a couple things detracted from a great experience.
Review.Contenu: The order was shipped incomplete.  LEDs were from two different color temperature bins.  Parts that were shipped are of very nice quality and the selection of parts is exceptional for quick prototyping or one-off projects.  I will definitely order again.

Review.Titre: Low communication
Review.Contenu: Low communication, no updates on custom LED after 7-10 days passed. Carged me, and then for some reason cancled it, putting me in a position of having to go through a paypal direct pay, of which I haven't recieved additional comunication on, which I imagine is going to lengthen the time on recieving my order. Just makes ordering from them feel a bit sketchy. Have not recieved any products yet, so cannot comment on that. Over all, pretty average/below average experience. Hoping the quality of the product will up my opinion in ordering from then again.

Review.Titre: Not happy with product
Review.Contenu: Staff very knowledgeable, products were not as reliable as I hoped connector ends would be better with permanent wires attached difficult to establish good connections, wireless remote has a very limited range like 2-3 feet adhesive didn’t secure  definitely buy straps to retain

Review.Titre: No instructions what so ever to make up…
Review.Contenu: No instructions what so ever to make up the various connections....yea ...there are some if you go back on line...but there not that great.....would have been nicer to have a set in the “kit” you sent.....

Review.Titre: LED strips don't stay glued to…
Review.Contenu: LED strips don't stay glued to cabinets. Some areas are pulling away already after install.  I cleaned with alcohol prior.  Strip connectors are very difficult to use and the corner connector didn't work at all. Prices are very good, but you get what you pay for.

Review.Titre: the prices for LEDs are great, however the "Kits are incomplete.
Review.Contenu: I bought an LED kit and the heat sink was not compatible and would not screw together, when I called i was told that there was another part that i needed.I thought the definition of a kit was that all parts were included. The LEDs are a good price so I will just buy the LEDs only.

Review.Titre: Dimmer for Low Voltage LED Lights Didn't Work...
Review.Contenu: Overall, service was excellent, but with one reservation. I talked to an informative staff member about dimming outdoor, low voltage (12V) LED bulbs. Based on his recommendation, I purchased a "driver" and a dimming device with a remote control. I am rather sure that I got the right bulbs (from another vendor), good for "full dimming" and for "AC/DC" (the driver puts out 12V DC). PROBLEM: The dimmer doesn't work! I took it out of the circuit, and everything works fine except no dimming. Too bad for me? ... Or is there another solution?

Review.Titre: Once I placed my order it came very …
Review.Contenu: Once I placed my order it came very quickly. However, I needed to call back with questions and could not get anyone.  No one answered the phone for several days and my voice message did not get returned. I had to continue calling until eventually someone answered the phone.

Review.Titre: Can't say if product is good cause it…
Review.Contenu: Can't say if product is good cause it is still in shipment. Of course i don't mind the burocracy involved in it but is very sad that once the order is assigned to the local shipping company (Italy) all tracks are lost. I now have an issue with sda to be solved

Review.Titre: Unclear description = incorrect ordering
Review.Contenu: I ordered the wrong size because the description wasn't quite clear. They didn't clearly label that the listed diameter tube sizing is the size it shrinks INTO. As a result, I decided to order something larger because I assumed the sizing was the initial size of the tube and it would shrink to fit whatever size cord or tube you'd fit it over with. I ended up receiving 10 feet of tubing that's far too large and thus unusable. Maybe this is just something that's understood but I believe it to be problematic. Regardless, I do feel like the company does a good job of packing ans shipping their items quickly.

Review.Titre: It is great if you know what you are…
Review.Contenu: It is great if you know what you are doing. If you’re a novice, it is difficult to navigate what you need. The order was affordable and arrived rapidly. I have no complaints other than trying to decide what to buy

Review.Titre: Product ordered was not in stock and…
Review.Contenu: Product ordered was not in stock and LED Supply made no effort to inform me of that fact.  I called to inquire where my order was and was told that they were out of stock.  I found what I needed elsewhere but did not cancel my order.

Review.Titre: Product is fine
Review.Contenu: Product is fine.   Paid extra for overnight delivery.  1st delivery Friday after hours.( no one here)     2nd delivery Saturday 6:18  we were closed.  Delivered in mail box the following Tuesday afternoon.

Review.Titre: Service is great... products not so much.
Review.Contenu: Service is great. The quality control on the products are not so great. Ordered eight, three foot strips of led lights and one had to be replaced because it flickered. Also the adhesive failed on most of them after two days, so ended up rubber cementing them.

Review.Titre: Service improved
Review.Contenu: I placed an order on April 13th and still have not received it. April 18th was the last tracking information I received and it showed it was in transit. I spoke with someone from the company whose only response was that due to the pandemic some items were taking longer to arrive. The only option he gave me was to wait.  I have since left two messages inquiring about my order and have not received a return call. Update- after posting the review I did receive a call back and they were willing to send out another shipment.  However by the time the item was back in stock, my original items finally arrived. I was pleased with the improvement of the service.

Review.Titre: That one time...plus some
Review.Contenu: Well I love LED supply. They always ship fast and have great products. Except for the time I bought my first luxgeon led and had an issue with one of the led nodes falling off making the led unusable. I reached out to LED supply about this and was never replied to.Edit: Fast forward 2 months after my original review. I was contacted by the company and told to reply to an email if this issue was not resolved. Well I've replied a hand full of times with yet again no response. It was a direct response to the sales member that emailed me. I can't see that being lost in the spam folder. This whole situation is a joke.

Review.Titre: I’ll try them again
Review.Contenu: The product iitself is excellent...however their was an issue with shipping and I didn’t get what I ordered for a week later after paying for 2 day shipping. However when I called them they were helpful and understanding. Will use them again.

Review.Titre: Under counter lighting: B-
Review.Contenu: I came to the site to learn about LED under counter lighting for my kitchen. I found a lot of interesting information from videos and was able to purchase all the parts I needed. Even using the purchased aluminum track and diffuser I find the LED strips to reflect in the old and new countertop and on the back splash. I am planning to only point the lights at the underside of the rear cabinet to avoid a line of LED dots. This may work somewhat well but renders a lot of the parts I bought useless. I also have found that the wire to wire and wire to strip connectors are extremely difficult to undo if you haven’t made a solid connection or one wire is a little out of kilter. I may have to throw some away and purchase new ones. Overall I wouldn’t have started the project if I knew it was going to work out this way.

Review.Titre: I bought strip lighting for under…
Review.Contenu: I bought strip lighting for under cabinet lights during a kitchen remodel. Parts were back ordered but website didn't state that when I ordered, so that set me back about a week. When I called in the guy that took my call was very friendly and helpful. I had ordered connectors that the site recommended for my lights and they turned out to be the wrong connectors. Already behind schedule I ended up having to solder the connections. I now have $22 worth of connectors that I will be trying to return. The products work great now that they're all hooked up. Not a bad company but don't trust the recommended accessories tabs.

Review.Titre: Product works
Review.Contenu: Product works, goes through batteries quick. Wish the lights stay on little longer after turn on. 10 secs not good. We got 3 of these and they on/off on/ off etc too quick, little annoying . Now hard wire so keep on.

Review.Titre: Worked amazing and was super easy
Review.Contenu: Worked amazing and was super easy. LED strip slid right in on both sides and both strips turned on. On certain colors the first strip and 2nd strip are different colors though? Ill set it to red but the 2nd will be green.

Review.Titre: One of the light connector broke off…
Review.Contenu: One of the light connector broke off while I was trying to position the lights you can't push the adhesive hard enough to make it stay to the surface otherwise if you do it will broke.

Review.Titre: While the quality of the products are outstanding, navigating the website is a headache b
Review.Contenu: While the quality of the products have been superior ordering theses products has been an effort in futility.  This company needs to spend some time making their website intuitive, their search feature useable.  Additionally when parts are ordered their are absolutely no instructions included explaining how to use those parts.  This is unfortunate as another company could very easily use this site as a template, improve the ordering / search  features and include instructions and make a killing.  On line technical support was also non-exitant.   I must say that one I figured out what part I needed and figured out where on the site to order it from, the parts arrived quickly and shipping was free.

Review.Titre: need to keep better track of onhand items
Review.Contenu: Items ordered showed 23 on hand . Three days later said to be out of  stock but online still showed 23 on hand.Call and was advised out of stock.I question website . It then showed 46 in stock . Items arrived one week later.

Review.Titre: as with many places it depends on the personnel
Review.Contenu: as with many places, it depends on the help person: one seemed to be irked/bothered by my questions, another went out of his way to help make sure I got the right equipment/parts. So: a 5-star and a 1-star.

Review.Titre: I had bought 6 leds
Review.Contenu: I had bought 6 leds, the aqua color, thinking it would be a bit more blue. They were looking pretty green and half of them were super dim and the other half were super bright. Perfect size just problems between all 6

Review.Titre: Bought 2 LED star chips and there a…
Review.Contenu: Bought 2 LED star chips and there a working so far. Was disappointed that with all the information I provided I still had to guest which LED was the right one to purchase. Was very confusing.

Review.Titre: Just good enough to get by.
Review.Contenu: The good: Nice selection. Easy to use website. Fast shipping.The bad: The specialty connectors for LED strips were poorly designed and unreliable. The pricing is ridiculously high.

Review.Titre: The LED lights flickering
Review.Contenu: The LED lights arrived quickly but not great quality. One of the remotes shorted out after second use and one of the light strips flickering randomly.Probably won't purchase from them again.

Review.Titre: Not happy with how a problem was handled!
Review.Contenu: I had ordered two 12vdc dimmer switches. Installed one did not work properly. Triple checked wiring making sure all was correct. Called about the problem. Talked about wiring being correct, power supply , etc.  I was told "might be defective switch". I installed second switch, same result. Installed another switch from different supplier, worked perfect. I will note the wiring, power supply all the same.  I will say all other products have been fine. My upset was with the reps. comment. "Send it back and we will send another one, We cannot just send you out one"  I explained I am contractor and needed it badly to complete the job. Will not be my first choice next time.

Review.Titre: Order was ok
Review.Contenu: Order was ok, lowered rating bc they emailed me stuff I didn't sign up for.Edit. Was mistaken about shipping, that was another order. Improved score by one. Email sent was a request for this survey.

Review.Titre: its a small thing
Review.Contenu: its a small thing, but I ordered two battery boxes, and the small sealing screw for one of them was not provided. The missing screw was sent to me immediately after I notified the company.

Review.Titre: The LED strip was fine but I would need more light.
Review.Contenu: The LED strip was fine but I would have liked to known that I needed a power supply also.  I also wish I knew how much light they put out, I needed more under the cabinet lighting for food preparation.

Review.Titre: i have never installed LED strip…
Review.Contenu: i have never installed LED strip lighting before, I called and your representative said draw up a plan in what I want and they will figure out what I need, sounds great at the surface. what I got was an email with a bunch of part numbers, seven different ones. not how many I need of each or how to assembly them. I now have a pile of parts and no idea of they go together. you have some videos but not ones that would help me. I'm a very hands-on guy and still struggling. a simple flat pattern drawing of it assembled would have been great.I had given them two stars originally but updated it to four due to the customer experience that when I called them for help. Jason was very helpful walking me through the process.

Review.Titre: Good, but can improve areas
Review.Contenu: Light strips work great for what I need, but not updating inventory on the website caused a 3-4 day delay. A better description of current rating of the switches would have also been nice, as I wouldn't have bought them, now knowing they get too hot powering a full reel, let alone 2. Ended up using a household light switch in the end.

Review.Titre: Time it took for stock to be available
Review.Contenu: Would have given 5 stars if not for being too low on stock to send my order right away. However, now that I have the products and they are installed they work brilliantly!

Review.Titre: 9 feet too much!
Review.Contenu: I ended up buying 9 feet too much tape light ($39), I think because of confusing the online explanations of converting meters to feet. Also why are the tracks 39", but the light strips are to be cut every 36"? All very confusing.

Review.Titre: Great source for LED projects
Review.Contenu: Great resources to help DIYers. Prompt service and shipping. Affordable prices. Beetle clip used to connect LED strip to wire did not work, could not pierce wire insulation to make electrical connection. Soldering is more reliable and durable. Also, the lens on the angled aluminum track for 12V LED strip would not slide into the grooves on the track. I tried soap and oil to lubricate to no avail. Had to cut lens into pieces to slide them in. Had no issue with the flat track lens. My finished project looks great.

Review.Titre: Good kit...just missing a couple of tweeks.
Review.Contenu: The replacement kit for my outside light included all the parts and directions I needed, with the exception of additional wire nuts for an additional connection.  The additional connection was required due to the too short wire lengths from the driver to the main power source/dusk-dawn device.  The driver to LED attachment plugs worked well.

Review.Titre: Helpful stuff stands behind their products
Review.Contenu: Reasonable time to receive the parts and quick response after the question asked over the email when I found out the led driver didn’t work. Later I learned that it needed a little more output amp with constant current. These are new knowledge to me and I appreciate your input. Thanks.

Review.Titre: Good product
Review.Contenu: Good product, but lacked paper instructions and online weren't the best.

Review.Titre: Good Enough -- not great
Review.Contenu: Prices very competitive. Easy to install wafer lighting.  Quickly delivered.  I like the new "multi-color" options on LED wafer lamps.  Install time choice of 3000K, 4000K, or 5000K allowed us to choose the best lighting option for our space.  That said, shipping pricing a little wonky -- free* for small orders, not free for larger orders.  Seems backwards.  I resisted the urge to break my order of 8 lamps up into 4 orders of two lamps each.Also, one of the lamps was flaky after install (flickering).  I had ordered an extra one, and just swapped it in.   This was less expensive (in my time) than trying to get a refund (which is probably available).

Review.Titre: Motion sensor don’t work as advertised…
Review.Contenu: Motion sensor don’t work as advertised and 1/2 of them don’t work at all. Scott at customer service reached out and made things right. It great to see this company still has core values and treats the customer with respect.

Review.Titre: Quite good
Review.Contenu: Quite good, easy to follow instructions found online.  None in the packaging.The wire supplied with the kit was okay, but had a stiff plasticky sheath.  It was a little difficult to work with.  I had to order a roll through Amazon, and the covering was rubbery, a LOT easier to properly connect.

Review.Titre: Sun Distributor strobe
Review.Contenu: Bought these parts to modify my 1955 Sun Distributor Strobe for modern electronic ignition systems, and, forgreater accuracy on vintage ignition systems.Many thanks JLS.

Review.Titre: A late response to an issue -- But a helpful response
Review.Contenu: I bought a TL-BT2-010 0-10V dimmer smart switch from LED Supply because it advertised compatibility with Alexa.  I could not get it to work with Alexa and requested help from LED Supply.  They initially stated that they could not help me.   They also have a return policy of "Unused and in resellable condition", so I could not return it.   I posted a review that described this scenario and was later contacted by LED Supply informing me that there was a solution to buy an additional BlueTooth hub.   This did solved my issue and the switch now integrates with Alexa.   LED Supply should change their product description to let buyers know that the hub is necessary AND be more consistent in their customer responses.   They did show me that they cared by reading and replying to a less than stellar review.   I would use them again.

Review.Titre: Product worked exactly as advertised
Review.Contenu: Product worked exactly as advertised. I'm using it an a RFI sensative environment and these lights are RF quiet. I was a bit surprised how hot the strip gets running at 13.8V but was assured they are safe to operate at that voltage.

Review.Titre: Good choice of products.
Review.Contenu: Good choice of products.After watching video about cutting and soldering strips I was very disappointed with how difficult it was to remove plastic before I could soldering to. Video or description did not have any warning about how difficult that is to remove plastic without damaging product.

Review.Titre: Altair Light LED Repair Kit
Review.Contenu: What was ordered was not a true match for replacing the original but was close enough that with a little experimenting it accomplished the intended goal. The exterior light now works again and shines bright into the night.

Review.Titre: They have my name on file and did not…
Review.Contenu: They have my name on file and did not have to go through all the information,over all the time

Review.Titre: It would have been 5 stars
Review.Contenu: It would have been 5 stars. I appreciated the fact that on the second order someone responded that the jumper wires were not compatible and they substituted the correct ones. That did not happen on my initial order and although inexpensive, still a waste of time and money.

Review.Titre: Worth keeping the Light Fixtures
Review.Contenu: For someone with lots of electrical experience this is a very easy task, for others with no practical experience it might be a little frustrating but definitely doable,.

Review.Titre: Good communication
Review.Contenu: I had several questions during the process of placing my order, and I received answers to most of them. Ordering the right LED can be tricky, and I actually ordered the wrong thing at first, but they quickly canceled my order for me when I let them know.

Review.Titre: Very good place to buy LED lights and supplies from
Review.Contenu: The led lights were a very good quality and very bright. This was the standard led strip w/adhesive backing. The battery case that it came with was not up to the quality of the led lights, however. I fully expect that it will need to be replaced on the not to distant future. The customer service was outstanding, very helpful, on all accounts. Overall, a very good place to buy led products from. I would definitely buy from them again.

Review.Titre: Fast and accurate once ordered
Review.Contenu: My order arrived quickly, and with everything I ordered.  Sometimes I find it difficult to know if I'm ordering the correct/compatible items (e.g. voltage, plug-diameter, etc.)

Review.Titre: I found everything I needed
Review.Contenu: I found everything I needed.  I did receive a wrong shape of track, I contacted Scott via email and a picture of the track I received and Scott had the Angle track on its way, that day.  Great customer service, and supply.

Review.Titre: Good experience with LEDSupply
Review.Contenu: The information on the website is fantastic.  Very helpful for finding what I needed.Only downside for me was shipping cost.  I thought $20 for shipping was a little on the espensive side.

Review.Titre: On-line Explanations Help
Review.Contenu: The on-line videos and explanations of the LED strip lighting system was very good.

Review.Titre: Good choice of products
Review.Contenu: Good choice of products, but on some kits the prices are a bit higher than big box stores. Although I don't know if there is a difference in quality except that their LEDs work well.

Review.Titre: Almost everything I needed was in the…
Review.Contenu: Almost everything I needed was in the kitchen.1st time using led strip lighting. Very pleased with results.

Review.Titre: Every Order Has Been a Good Experience
Review.Contenu: The website is easy to navigate. Shipping is fast and economical. I've only experienced an out-of-stock one time and was able to substitute.

Review.Titre: Easy to order
Review.Contenu: Easy to order. Fast shipping.

Review.Titre: I ordered two LED kits and only…
Review.Contenu: I ordered two LED kits and only received one, although the enclosed receipt said two.  I call the support line and they sent the second LED kit in the mail and I received it three days later.  I am really happy with your service.

Review.Titre: My "go to" guys for lighting and electronics
Review.Contenu: The people I talk to are knowledgeable and willing to help. LED Supply has a wide variety of products to help make my projects workable.

Review.Titre: LEDs work as advertised
Review.Contenu: LEDs work as advertised and were a fair price.  They took too long to arrive due to the US postal service.  You might consider UPS or FedEx as a better carrier.

Review.Titre: Worked
Review.Contenu: Worked!  They had what I needed to hook up a string of LEDs and turn them on with little fuss.  No dead pixels.

Review.Titre: Your website needs to be better at…
Review.Contenu: Your website needs to be better at finding what you want to buy other than that every thing is good

Review.Titre: I liked the detailed notes for the…
Review.Contenu: I liked the detailed notes for the different products.  They made it easier to narrow down the product I needed.

Review.Titre: Delivery was a bit expensive
Review.Contenu: Well delivery was a bit expensive, items are what I needed and support seems to be there if needed.

Review.Titre: Good company and good support
Review.Contenu: Good company and good support.  I wish the plug and play led strip lights came in bright color option.  Warm is too yellow and cool is too blue.

Review.Titre: Overall good experience
Review.Contenu: Overall good experience. Would have desired more technical/layout help during support calls into LED Supply, but I understand this is difficult to do without seeing the space.

Review.Titre: LED flexible strips
Review.Contenu: The lights worked great. The only negative was that the glue strip came off with the paper backing. I used an emblem adhesive to hold it up.

Review.Titre: Fast,Free and correct
Review.Contenu: Fast,Free and correct. The rest is because rating requires 25 characters and I can not be succinct...

Review.Titre: Helpful staff
Review.Contenu: Helpful staff. Prompt service. Wide range of products.The only issue I have is that the shipping costs are very high to Canada. On top of the shipping, carrier fees are over and above the shipping.

Review.Titre: Support from Scott was great
Review.Contenu: Support from Scott was great. Perhaps better written explanation enclosed with the kit would have saved my time and his

Review.Titre: Quality product
Order went good but when I try and get…
Review.Contenu: Order went good. I am now preparing to order a driver for this LED. Thanks to Scott for advising me on a driver.

Review.Titre: Was able to order and receive a product…
Review.Contenu: Was able to order and receive a product to complete a lighting project.

Review.Titre: Good Service
Review.Contenu: One of the items I wanted (a driver) was out of stock, but I was able to get a different one, and the order was shipped quickly and arrived in perfect condition.

Review.Titre: Recived part that did not work but received credit
Review.Contenu: Ordered a part for an Altair light from Costco based on the information their website. There is an outdated info graphic that shows a part they no longer carry. I didn't catch this when ordering and the wiring instructions for the part I ordered didn't match up with the light I had. Emailed and asked for a return shipping label or refund and after initially denying my request I did receive a full refund. Thank you.

Review.Titre: good people
Review.Contenu: Customer service led me to the right product.

Review.Titre: And there was light.                           Had issue with one item in order
Review.Contenu: Had issue with one item in orderIt was resolved immediately and professionally and most importantly satisfactorily

Review.Titre: Got what I ordered promptly but haven’t…
Review.Contenu: Got what I ordered promptly but haven’t use yet. Might have to do a return since i may have mistakenly ordered an incompatible part for what I plan to fix

Review.Titre: Th goto site for lighting solutions
The person I talked to and ordered from…
Review.Contenu: The person I talked to and ordered from was very helpful.

Review.Titre: Good service
Pros and Cons
Review.Contenu: PositiveCalled and asked for recommendation for a project - got a very helpful and knowledgeable response and I placed my order.  Items arrived in a timely fashion.Negative EZ Click-Tight LED Strip Connectors break easily or were faulty recommend you order lots of extras!

Review.Titre: Excellent experience
Review.Contenu: Went into a home project with very little LED lighting knowledge. Found LEDSupply while reading up on things. After I thought I knew what I needed I emailed their Sales dept with a couple questions and was quickly answered. Made my order which was delivered very quickly. Everything installed and worked on the first try. Will do business with LEDSupply again and recommend to my friends.

Review.Titre: Online ordering was easy and arrived…
Review.Contenu: Online ordering was easy and arrived quickly.

Review.Titre: On checking out I wish when I called…
Review.Contenu: On checking out I wish when I called and built a package with the customer service agent (who was great) I wish he could just forward the shopping cart to my email so I can just check out. What happens is my customers sometimes are the ones by the material and it’s a big pain in the butt if I just don’t go buy it but if I can forward them the email so all I have to do is pay that makes it way easier. Thanks

Review.Titre: Soldered leads
Review.Contenu: Love the LED products but have issues with wire leads.  I purchased the Cree CXB 1310 with leads. One day after installing  the LEDin the fixture the soldered lead popped off the LED pad. I purchased it with leads because the previous one I purchased I soldered the leads on and the same thing happened.  I re-soldered it on, so far so good. So the soldered leads have popped off the LED pad more than once in the pas. Typically it happens when it gets really cold and really hot.

Review.Titre: Good Lighting
Review.Contenu: Everything arrived well - packaged.  Only complaint was no wiring diagram included in the packaging.  Found after scrolling through retro kit website page.  Would rather have the information needed to complete the re-wire and not a coupon for 5% off next purchase accompanying a sale flyer.  Hardware is doing great so far.

Review.Titre: Replacement for Costco lights
Review.Contenu: Purchased a replacement LED driver for my house lights that came from Costco.  Driver did not fix the issue, so went back and purchased the entire LED replacement kit.  Much better solution all around.Would have given 5 stars if the website would have been more clear to suggest going with the replacement instead of just a driver.  Wish I could return the drivers I purchased, but it costs too much to ship them back!  Most companies would offer free returns in this case.

Review.Titre: I have a Costco carriage light where…
Review.Contenu: I have a Costco carriage light where the driver crapped out. LEDSupply has a nice flow chart to help you select the correct driver. The only issue I have is that the exact driver, which has 6-wires and uses a photocell input, is not available. The one they sent me has 4-wires. I ultimately called and a customer service person told me I had to change the photocell to interrupt the AC voltage. They have the photocells as well and I bought one. Since shipping was included in the price, I only lost some time. But it would have been nice to know before I tried to install the new driver.

Review.Titre: Good product as described
Review.Contenu: Good product as described No issues

Review.Titre: Product worked good and received it…
Review.Contenu: Product worked good and received it fast. Only thing I would say is I thought it was suppose to be a white led and it is yellow instead. Wish it was white led but it still works good. Over all happen with the product.

Review.Titre: Reliable ordering
Review.Contenu: I placed an online order for  LED drivers to fix some porch light problems. Online ordering was simple , and offered multiple shipping options. Regular orders are shipped USPS at no additional cost which was fine.They also offer discount codes that can be found online. I would offer a 5 star rating if they provided shipping confirmation, but overall very happy with the service and the products.

Review.Titre: Their support is responsive and…
Review.Contenu: Their support is responsive and helpful.  Wish they had a wall 4 color controller for their RF controller like others.  Their high end string lights claim a 2700 deg kelvin temp, but other lights I have, have a much warmer light.  Their 2700 deg kelvin string looks like 4000 deg plus.  This is the Hue string.

Review.Titre: LED at light speed
Review.Contenu: They shipped the same day and the return/refund was simple and fast, without any "restocking fee" nonsense like some other places. Their website needs more thorough pictures of some of their products. I ordered some LED rope lights and one reason I had to return them was because the photo showed them with the lights connected to the wire with a plug that was easy to unplug, and what I got were ones with connectors sealed in.

Review.Titre: I purchased a LED Driver (APC-16-350 to…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a LED Driver (APC-16-350 to replace the faulty one in an Altair Wall Lantern bought at Costco   The installation was successful and the lantern comes on when it gets dark and no longer flickers.  It did require buying a special zip tie and metric machine screw, but the video on your website guided me through all the steps,  Hopefully the next replacement ( I have 2 other Altair Lanterns) will be quicker.  Thanks for the great product!

Review.Titre: Go-To for all things LED
Review.Contenu: Excellent products, great customer service, hands down best resource for technical info and all things LED.Only complaint I have is the online claimed inventory is frequently off and you are not contacted to let you know your entire order will be delayed until the out of stock item is available. This could be weeks.Contact customer service though and they take care of the issue immediately.Fast shipping. Love this company!

Review.Titre: Doesn't support complete OFF level
Review.Contenu: I was hoping to replace a single switch controlling 4 LED panels with this dimmer to get two panels at different levels.  Unfortunately, unlike some other 0-10V dimmers I have used for other projects, it does not support a full OFF level from the dimmer, and I didn't have enough room in the box to have both a switch AND this dimmer.  As a result, I had to go a different route instead.  Having said that, the unit does work as a dimmer, as advertised, and I need to see if I can use it somewhere else or not.

Review.Titre: Good service, bad connectors!
Review.Contenu: The phone service and most of the products were of high quality. The reason you are getting only 4 starts is because your solderless connectors are junk They wouldn't stay on the wire or LED strip or both. I had to take them apart to fix them which still did not work. I had to throw them out and solder all of my connections. Hopefully you find a better supplier.A refund of those connectors would be nice.Rick,

Review.Titre: LEDSupply had been very responsive to…
Review.Contenu: LEDSupply had been very responsive to my order to replace a faulty LED strip.  I was in immediate need of a replacement, so purchased outright again without any credit for the faulty one....but they responded sooner than I thought, and assured me that in the future any purchases would have a credit for this situation.  I will definitely go back to them in the future.

Review.Titre: Amazing selection of supply options
Review.Contenu: Amazing selection of supply options, but probably a little slanted towards the professional rather than hobbyist.  You can work your way through the catalogue, and get all you need, but an email or phone call might be a good idea.  VERY responsive to questions, quick turn around.  Took me three orders, but got my complex set up done (10 bookshelves with 2 power units, all controlled with one remote).  They were willing to ship me a $0.98 part in last order!

Review.Titre: The lights I purchase were to yellow
Review.Contenu: The lights I purchase were more yellow then the 3000k they state. I would rate them at 2500-2700k. We are having to purchase all new lighting because they are so yellow.

Review.Titre: Product was as advertised and makes a…
Review.Contenu: Product was as advertised and makes a great replacement for our old recessed fluorescent lighting.  A bit of design feedback:  The corner connectors are simply too tight.  It takes real strength, accuracy and some patience to insert the light strip leads correctly into the connector receptacles.  It might be better to have looser connectors that can be heat shrunk into place with something like a hair dryer once a solid electrical connection is verified.

Review.Titre: Great for tight installation area but take caution with the lead wires.
Review.Contenu: The LED units I purchased were perfect for installation in a ceiling where you have beams above the wallboard.  The depth of the light units fit perfectly within the wallboard thickness and made the beams irrelevant.  My only issue was the leads provided by the company were too short and kept coming out of the connectors.  I had to lengthen the wire lead and reinsert them into the connector.  There was plenty of room in the connector boxes for two Romex cables.

Review.Titre: Pre-order help was great
Review.Contenu: Informational replies came quickly and very helpful for placing an order. Without that advice, ordering would have been more difficult. My only issue was a hold on the entire order for something that was out of stock. No one at LED supply communicated about the hold. I had to check order status a few days later to learn about it. Thankfully, my client was understanding of my delay to install.

Review.Titre: Everything needed to repair my outside…
Review.Contenu: Everything needed to repair my outside lights was included in the refurbishing kit, made the process easy and straight forward. My only concern was the led lights have a slight yellow tent. Pricing was good and delivery was excellent.

Review.Titre: LED is very helpful and has a wide…
Review.Contenu: LED is very helpful and has a wide variety of products.  I recently ordered some parts for mt LED light strip and they came in 2 days at no charge ship.My only somewhat negative comment is I tried numerous times calling for a tech support question, but their line only goes to voice message.  I'm guessing that may be a product of COVID.Otherwise easy company to do business with and a good variety of products.

Review.Titre: Customer service was very knowledgeable…
Review.Contenu: Customer service was very knowledgeable of the products and my order status. My product was delayed several weeks due to manufacturing delays but when I called LEdSupply was quick to find the answer for me. The customer service representative speaks English and the business is located in the USA, giving greater confidence of the quality in design and their ability to stand behind the product.

Review.Titre: Best supplier for these products
Review.Contenu: The product listings and descriptions are well presented on website.All information available made me confident in my purchase with no need to call for help.Package arrived earlier than expected and at a better price than popular jungle e-commerce site.My project is working as expected.

Review.Titre: Good product that needs a tweak.
Review.Contenu: I purchased some of their white led strips. The product is good quality. Shipped very fast and came well packaged. Only issue was the led strip cut points to shrink the length down to a length you need are too far apart. I ended up with extra length I had to awkwardly curl at the end cause it was a few inches too long due to location of the next cut point. But overall happy.

Review.Titre: Shipping issues with sale items.
Review.Contenu: Great products and great service. The only thing keeping my purchase from getting 5 stars is that it appears that sale items do not qualify for free shipping (even when the item's sale page says "First Class shipping - free". And adding insult to injury, sale item also do not qualify for the $7.99 2-Day FedEx but are charge $9.99 for 2-Day FedEx shipping.

Review.Titre: We called for advice before we ordered
Review.Contenu: We called for advice before we ordered, the man was quite patient, he explained all he could to us, sounded like he knew his field.  Seems the product we received was quality, our electrician didn’t say anything to the contrary.  It looks great installed, and will provide plenty of light in a workspace.

Review.Titre: Everything worked out fine
Review.Contenu: Everything worked out fine, could have had wire nuts in the Kit

Review.Titre: Shipping method was USPS First Class
Review.Contenu: Shipping method was USPS First Class. Took over two weeks to receive order. Order was held at closest shipping facility for eight days before delivering. No helpful support from LEDSupply. Have ordered from LEDSupply again already, but chose a better shipping method. Can't understand why First Class is even an option...

Review.Titre: Good service
Review.Contenu: All things considered I got good service. It would have been great if the person I was working with had read all the questions I asked before making my order. I did not know that the led strip was coming with a jumper wire attached. There for I ordered two jumpers when I only needed one.  Makes me wonder why I drew a diagram of what I thought was needed and even sent pictures of the cabinets where the lights were going to be installed. Anyway no harm done. Will I use your products and services again? Probably, unless I find another provider that likes to follow up with the customer to ensure what I think I need and what they think I need is the same.

Review.Titre: Love the AC 5050 light strip, hate the mounting track
Review.Contenu: Love the AC 5050 light strip.  Very nice quality.  Don’t like the plastic mounting track.  Tolerance is way too tight.  Going to take me 15 minutes to mount and then 3 hours to try and get the strip into the track.  But no other choice as the light strip is being mounted under an outside deck.

Review.Titre: I bought this product because my other…
Review.Contenu: I bought this product because my other LED power supply one of them only lasted like four months and they send me another one and that one lasted about a year so I don't like replacing power supplies every year just got this one about a month ago and we'll see how good it is. We use this type at work and they seem to do the job.

Review.Titre: Not enough details in the product…
Review.Contenu: Not enough details in the product description. Did not call out the overall length of the LED strip. Also, it indicated it used 3 AA batteries but the unit I received required 6 AAs. Battery pack was double the size and weight of what I needed.Does anyone actually read these survey responses?

Review.Titre: LED strip light good, mounting channel not so good.
Review.Contenu: The LED light strip worked well for my project.  I had the 36" strip which could be cut in half.  If it could be cut in shorter increments that may be useful with other projects.I also had the clear plastic mounting channel to hold the strip ridged.  The strip was a very tight fit, and spreading the channel open to get it in caused the clear plastic to turn white in places, signs of stress.  I was really concerned about breaking the channel, but that didn't happen.

Review.Titre: Overall pleased with the support and…
Review.Contenu: Overall pleased with the support and products received.  One unfortunate issue was that the plastic connectors for a 2-wire single color applications were of a poor quality.  I had difficulty seating the LED strip to them and getting the prongs to properly puncture - also getting the 2 wires properly positioned into the wire side with 4 slots for a 2-wire application.  Due to number of times needed to open and close the cover to get the contacts to work the covers on many of the connectors simply broke off.

Review.Titre: Great Product, Needs an Installation Sheet
Review.Contenu: Thank you for allowing me to rate LEDSupply ... Much Appreciated!  I have installed two of the kits so far, and both of them work wonderfully - Thank You!  I would have rated you with 5 stars, but I feel more installation instruction should have been provided.  In that light, I have generated a short instruction sheet and drawing you might want to include with each of your kits.  Send me a quick email and I'll send it to you ... check it out and tell me what you think.  The GOOP I mentioned is a Clear Sealant available at most hardware stores, and it basically waterproofs the connections.  Thanks Again for offering such a fine product!Gerald MerryUSNavy-Retired

Review.Titre: Great products and service
Review.Contenu: I've experienced great service and products from LEDSupply. I would have given 5 stars but the LED strips I ordered for a recent project had a different connection between the power supply connector and LED strip than before. It wasn't a big problem but required me to redesign the lamp I had built.

Review.Titre: Because supply chain issues limited…
Review.Contenu: Because supply chain issues limited local availability, it was great to be able to order from the wide selection at LEDsupply.  Everything was shipped promptly, and worked as advertised.  The only problems were from my own rookie mistakes.

When the driver arrived, I wired it into place and tried it out.  It is working well and I couldn't be more pleased!  Many thanks.
